scripts.install: (cd service-reviews; npm i;) & (cd service-colors; npm i;) & (cd service-accounts; npm i) & (cd gateway-hue-review; npm i;)
scripts.start: pm2 start ./service-accounts/ --name "service-accounts" -i 1; pm2 start ./service-reviews/ --name "service-reviews" -i 1; pm2 start ./service-colors/ --name "service-colors" -i 1; pm2 start ./gateway-hue-review/ --name "gateway-hue-review" -i 1;
scripts.stop: pm2 stop service-accounts; pm2 stop service-reviews; pm2 stop service-colors; pm2 stop gateway-hue-review
scripts.remove: pm2 flush; pm2 delete service-accounts; pm2 delete service-reviews; pm2 delete service-colors; pm2 delete gateway-hue-review;
